cases: .foo { /* allowed in certain old browsers */ padding: 1 px 2 px 3 px 4 px; }
.foo { /* allowed in certain old browsers */ padding: 1 px 4 px 3 px 2 px; }
.foo { /* allowed in certain old browsers */ padding: 4 px 3 px 2 px 1 px; }
.foo { /* allowed in certain old browsers */ padding: 4 px 1 px 2 px 3 px; }
.foo { border-color: red #f00f rgb(255 /* a */ 0 /* b */ 0) rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5); }
.foo { border-color: red rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5) rgb(255 /* a */ 0 /* b */ 0) #f00f; }
.foo { border-color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5) rgb(255 /* a */ 0 /* b */ 0) #f00f red; }
.foo { border-color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5) red #f00f rgb(255 /* a */ 0 /* b */ 0); }
.foo { background: cross-fade( 5% url( foo.png ), rgb( 0, 255, 0 ) ) left top; }
.foo { background: cross-fade( 5% url( foo.png ), rgb( 0, 255, 0 ) ) right top; }
.foo { background: cross-fade( 5% url( foo.png ), rgb( 0, 255, 0 ) ) right top; }

div { border-image: url( /foo/bar.png ) repeat round 10% 40% fill 30% 20% / 50% 80% 70% 60% / 9px 12px 11px 10px; }
div { border-image: url( /foo/bar.png ) round repeat 40% 30% fill 20% 10% / 80% 70% 60% 50% / 12px 11px 10px 9px; }
div { border-image: url( /foo/bar.png ) round repeat 40% 10% fill 20% 30% / 80% 50% 60% 70% / 12px 9px 10px 11px; }
.foo { margin: calc( /* comment1 */ 2px * /* comment2 */ 2 /* comment3 */ ) 3% calc( /* comment1 */ 2px * /* comment2 */ 2 /* comment3 */ ) 1px; }
.foo { margin: calc( /* comment1 */ 2px * /* comment2 */ 2 /* comment3 */ ) 1px calc( /* comment1 */ 2px * /* comment2 */ 2 /* comment3 */ ) 3%; }
div { background-image: linear-gradient( to left top, red, blue ); }
div { background-image: linear-gradient( to right top, red, blue ); }
div { background-image: linear-gradient( to right top, red, blue ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( circle 250px at left top, #00F, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( circle 250px at right top, #00F, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( circle 250px at right top, #00F, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( 10px 20px ellipse at top, #00F, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( 20px 10px ellipse at left, #00F, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( 20px 10px ellipse at right, #00F, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( 10% 20% at left top, #00F, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( 10% 20% at right top, #00F, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( 20% 10% at left top, #00F, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( 20% 10% at right top, #00F, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( ellipse calc( 1px + 2px ) 3px at top 10% left 20%, #00F, #08F 10%, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( ellipse calc( 1px + 2px ) 3px at top 10% right 20%, #00F, #08F 10%, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( ellipse 3px calc( 1px + 2px ) at top 20% left 10%, #00F, #08F 10%, #F00 ); }
div { background: radial-gradient( ellipse 3px calc( 1px + 2px ) at top 20% right 10%, #00F, #08F 10%, #F00 ); }

div { list-style-image: linear-gradient( to left, red, #00FF00 ); }
div { list-style-image: linear-gradient( to right, red, #00FF00 ); }
div { background: linear-gradient( calc( /* ignore calc angles */ 30deg * 2 ), red, blue ); }
div { transform: scale( /* a */ 1 /* b */ , /* c */  2 /* d */ ); }
div { transform: scale( /* a */ 2 /* b */ , /* c */  1 /* d */ ); }
div { transform: translate( /* a */ -1,/* b */ 1 /* c */ ); }

div { transform: translate( /* a */ 1,/* b */ -1 /* c */ ); }
div { transform: translate( /* a */ -1,/* b */ -1 /* c */ ); }
body { direction: ltr; float: left; } .foo { direction: ltr; float: left; }
body { direction: rtl; float: right; } .foo { direction: rtl; float: right; }
.foo { float: left; float: right; float: left; }
.foo { float: right; float: left; float: right; }
